entities.name: detention
entities.description: Detention is mentioned as an event that Umbridge has with Dolores.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is the one who is giving detention to Potter. She is described as having a soft voice and stretching out her short be-ringed fingers for his arm.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is the one receiving detention from Umbridge. He has a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: scar
entities.description: The scar on Potter's forehead is mentioned as being painful when touched by Umbridge.

entities.name: school bag
entities.description: Potter coughs up his school bag and leaves the room quickly.

relationships.description: Potter is receiving detention from Umbridge.
Umbridge is giving detention to Potter.
Umbridge has touched the scar on Potter's forehead.
Potter is carrying his school bag.
